data.title: Denver Nuggets Roster
data.meta_description: Denver Nuggets scores, news, schedule, players, stats, rumors, depth charts and more on RealGM.com
data.text:
Carmelo Anthony was selected as the #3 pick in the First Round of the 2003 NBA Draft by the Denver Nuggets. Carmelo Anthony signed a multi-year contract with the Denver Nuggets on July 17, 2003.

Ryan Bowen was selected as the #26 pick in the Second Round of the 1998 NBA Draft by the Denver Nuggets. Ryan Bowen signed a contract with the Denver Nuggets on September 16, 1999. Ryan Bowen re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Denver Nuggets on August 3, 2000. Ryan Bowen re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Denver Nuggets on July 18, 2002.

Francisco Elson was selected as the #12 pick in the Second Round of the 1999 NBA Draft by the Denver Nuggets. Francisco Elson signed a multi-year contract with the Denver Nuggets on September 12, 2003.

Nikoloz Tskitishvili was selected as the #5 pick in the First Round of the 2002 NBA Draft by the Denver Nuggets. Nikoloz Tskitishvili signed a multi-year contract with the Denver Nuggets on July 20, 2002.

Chris Andersen signed a multi-year contract with the Denver Nuggets on November 21, 2001. Chris Andersen re-signed to a contract as a free agent with the Denver Nuggets on September 29, 2003.

Jon Barry signed a contract as a free agent with the Denver Nuggets on August 19, 2003.

Earl Boykins signed a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Denver Nuggets on August 14, 2003.

Voshon Lenard signed a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Denver Nuggets on September 12, 2003.

Andre Miller signed a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Denver Nuggets on August 1, 2003.

Mark Pope signed a contract as a free agent with the Denver Nuggets on September 30, 2003.

Jeff Trepagnier signed a contract with the Denver Nuggets on March 23, 2003. Jeff Trepagnier re-signed to a contract as a free agent with the Denver Nuggets on April 2, 2003. Jeff Trepagnier re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Denver Nuggets on April 12, 2003.
